official_title: A resolution to authorize and request the President to proclaim May 7 of each year as a National Day of Prayer.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate May 7 of each year as the "National Day of Prayer."

titles.title: A resolution to authorize and request the President to proclaim May 7 of each year as a National Day of Prayer.
